message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its advanced features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its high quality and unique benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. Considering its market value and the cost of production, I kindly propose a price of $8500 for this exceptional item. I look forward to your response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your experience.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and uniqueness of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept the current price of $8500. I would like to make a counteroffer of $7000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for considering our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After evaluating the situation, I've decided to adjust our offer slightly. In light of your counteroffer, I propose a price of $7500 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our original price and your proposed offer, aiming to find a mutually beneficial solution. I look forward to your response and hope we can move forward towards a successful transaction.
